name: Bloom (itch) (thefatgalaboo)
description:
Made with https://adventurous-jay.itch.io/, Sosh, SnaggleGrolop, Charbim

- Left and right arrows to move

- 'E' to interact

Play as a character who is reliving their old memories, trying to hang on to past adventures. Explore each memory and complete a number of activities to progress. We made this during a hackathon with a few refinements after, but we hope you have fun experiencing the story we made! - Galaboo, AJay, Sosh, Snaggle, Charbim
